headline: Compared to Estimates, Charter (CHTR) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Charter (CHTR) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Charter Communications (CHTR) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Lag Estimates
summary: Charter (CHTR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -10.52% and -0.52%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Charter’s (NASDAQ:CHTR) Q3 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations
summary: Cable, internet, and telephone services provider Charter (NASDAQ:CHTR) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, but sales were flat year on year at $13.67 billion. Its GAAP profit of $8.34 per share was 11.2% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Charter Communications shares tumble as Q3 earnings miss expectations
summary: Investing.com -- Charter Communications Inc (NASDAQ:CHTR) shares fell 6.9% on Friday after the broadband provider reported third-quarter earnings that fell short of analyst expectations, as the company continues to lose internet customers amid a competitive environment.

headline: Charter Communications Profit Falls as  Internet Subscriber Base Weakens
summary: Charter Communications reported lower third-quarter profit as increased competition from fixed wireless and fiber connection hurts its broadband internet business.

headline: Charter Announces Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (along with its subsidiaries, the "Company" or "Charter"), which operates the Spectrum brand, today reported financial and operating results for the three and nine months ended September 30, 2025.
